attributes.action: Stop the Bank of England before it forces us into hyperinflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Printing money is a recipe for disaster! Do NOT let the Bank of England do it. What we need to do is to ride out the storm and using money we don’t have is what got us into this mess in the first place.  The Banks and Financial services can not be trusted to make decisions or self regulate themselves as their mistakes kick started this depression. 

The Government must pull in the reigns and ride this out, look at what the Americans are now doing and restart the economy by getting people back to work on public projects till things get better.
 
Remember 
The Weimar Republic printed money to try and kick start the economy and that led to there downfall of Germany and paved the way for the rise of the Third Reich and WWII.  May we never go down that road ever again…..
